con:part.con:content: <!--Platform version:--> <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/definitions/publiclighting/adhocmanagement-v1.0" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:ahman="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/publiclighting/adhocmanagement/2014/10" xmlns:common="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/common/2014/10" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/definitions/publiclighting/adhocmanagement-v1.0"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/definitions/publiclighting/adhocmanagement/imports" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/publiclighting/adhocmanagement/2014/10" schemaLocation="schemas/adhocmanagement-ws-publiclighting.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--An additional SOAP header 'MessagePriority' can be set. Values between 0 (low) and 9 (high), the default value is 4 (medium).--> <wsdl:message name="FindAllDevicesHeader"> <wsdl:part element="common:OrganisationIdentification" name="OrganisationIdentification"/> <wsdl:part element="common:UserName" name="UserName"/> <wsdl:part element="common:ApplicationName" name="ApplicationName"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="FindAllDevicesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:FindAllDevicesRequest" name="FindAllDevicesRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="FindAllDevicesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:FindAllDevicesResponse" name="FindAllDevicesResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetLightHeader"> <wsdl:part element="common:OrganisationIdentification" name="OrganisationIdentification"/> <wsdl:part element="common:UserName" name="UserName"/> <wsdl:part element="common:ApplicationName" name="ApplicationName"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetLightRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:SetLightRequest" name="SetLightRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetLightAsyncResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:SetLightAsyncResponse" name="SetLightAsyncResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetLightAsyncHeader"> <wsdl:part element="common:OrganisationIdentification" name="OrganisationIdentification"/> <wsdl:part element="common:UserName" name="UserName"/> <wsdl:part element="common:ApplicationName" name="ApplicationName"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetLightAsyncRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:SetLightAsyncRequest" name="SetLightAsyncRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetLightResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:SetLightResponse" name="SetLightResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetStatusHeader"> <wsdl:part element="common:OrganisationIdentification" name="OrganisationIdentification"/> <wsdl:part element="common:UserName" name="UserName"/> <wsdl:part element="common:ApplicationName" name="ApplicationName"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetStatusRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:GetStatusRequest" name="GetStatusRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetStatusAsyncResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:GetStatusAsyncResponse" name="GetStatusAsyncResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetStatusAsyncHeader"> <wsdl:part element="common:OrganisationIdentification" name="OrganisationIdentification"/> <wsdl:part element="common:UserName" name="UserName"/> <wsdl:part element="common:ApplicationName" name="ApplicationName"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetStatusAsyncRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:GetStatusAsyncRequest" name="GetStatusAsyncRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetStatusResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:GetStatusResponse" name="GetStatusResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResumeScheduleHeader"> <wsdl:part element="common:OrganisationIdentification" name="OrganisationIdentification"/> <wsdl:part element="common:UserName" name="UserName"/> <wsdl:part element="common:ApplicationName" name="ApplicationName"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResumeScheduleRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:ResumeScheduleRequest" name="ResumeScheduleRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResumeScheduleAsyncResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:ResumeScheduleAsyncResponse" name="ResumeScheduleAsyncResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResumeScheduleAsyncHeader"> <wsdl:part name="ApplicationName"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResumeScheduleAsyncRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:ResumeScheduleAsyncRequest" name="ResumeScheduleAsyncRequest"></wsdl:part> name="SetTransitionRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetTransitionAsyncResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:SetTransitionAsyncResponse" name="SetTransitionAsyncResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetTransitionAsyncHeader"> <wsdl:part element="common:OrganisationIdentification" name="OrganisationIdentification"/> <wsdl:part element="common:UserName" name="UserName"/> <wsdl:part element="common:ApplicationName" name="ApplicationName"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetTransitionAsyncRequest"> <wsdl:part name="SetTransitionResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SetLightMeasurementDeviceHeader"> <wsdl:part element="common:OrganisationIdentification" name="SetLightMeasurementDeviceResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ahman:SetLightMeasurementDeviceResponse" name="SetLightMeasurementDeviceResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType message="tns:SetLightMeasurementDeviceResponse" name="SetLightMeasurementDeviceResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="PublicLightingAdHocManagementPortSoap11" type="tns:PublicLightingAdHocManagementPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="FindAllDevices"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="FindAllDevicesRequest"> <soap:header message="tns:FindAllDevicesHeader" part="OrganisationIdentification" use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:FindAllDevicesHeader" part="UserName" use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:FindAllDevicesHeader" part="ApplicationName" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="FindAllDevicesResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SetLight"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="SetLightRequest"> message="tns:SetLightHeader" part="ApplicationName" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="SetLightAsyncResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="SetLightResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetStatus"> targetNamespace="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/publiclighting/adhocmanagement/2014/10" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:common="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/common/2014/10" xmlns:tns="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/publiclighting/adhocmanagement/2014/10"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/common/2014/10" schemaLocation="common-ws-publiclighting.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="FindAllDevicesRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PageSize" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Page" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FindAllDevicesResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DevicePage" type="tns:DevicePage"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetLightRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DeviceIdentification" type="common:Identification" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="6" name="LightValue" type="tns:LightValue"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetLightAsyncResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncResponse" type="common:AsyncResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetLightAsyncRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncRequest" type="common:AsyncRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetLightResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Result" type="common:OsgpResultType" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetStatusRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DeviceIdentification" type="common:Identification" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="BatchLogId" type="xsd:long" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetStatusAsyncResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncResponse" type="common:AsyncResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetStatusAsyncRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncRequest" type="common:AsyncRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetStatusResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Result" type="common:OsgpResultType" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Status" type="tns:Status"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ResumeScheduleRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DeviceIdentification" type="common:Identification" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Index"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="6"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="IsImmediate" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ResumeScheduleAsyncResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncResponse" type="common:AsyncResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ResumeScheduleAsyncRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncRequest" type="common:AsyncRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ResumeScheduleResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Result" type="common:OsgpResultType" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetTransitionRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DeviceIdentification" type="common:Identification" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="TransitionType" type="tns:TransitionType" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Time" type="xsd:time" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetTransitionAsyncResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncResponse" type="common:AsyncResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetTransitionAsyncRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncRequest" type="common:AsyncRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetTransitionResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Result" type="common:OsgpResultType" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetLightMeasurementDeviceRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DeviceIdentification" type="common:Identification" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="LightMeasurementDeviceIdentification" type="common:Identification" minOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SetLightMeasurementDeviceResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Result" type="common:OsgpResultType" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="Device"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DeviceUid" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="DeviceIdentification" type="common:Identification"/> <xsd:element name="ContainerPostalCode" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ContainerCity" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ContainerStreet" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ContainerNumber" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="GpsLatitude" type="xsd:float" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="GpsLongitude" type="xsd:float" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DeviceType" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Activated" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Ssld"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:Device"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="HasSchedule" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="PublicKeyPresent" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LightMeasurementDevice"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:Device"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Code" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Color" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DigitalInput" type="xsd:short" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DevicePage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Devices" type="tns:Device"/> <xsd:element name="Page" type="common:Page"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Status" abstract="true"/> <xsd:complexType name="DeviceStatus"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>DeviceStatus represents the retrieved status of a smart device.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:Status"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="LightValues" type="tns:LightValue"/> <xsd:element name="PreferredLinkType" type="tns:LinkType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ActualLinkType" type="tns:LinkType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="LightType" type="tns:LightType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="8" name="EventNotifications" type="tns:EventNotificationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LightSensorStatus"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Light sensor status represents the retrieved status of a light measurement device.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:Status"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Status" type="tns:LightSensorStatusType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LightValue"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Index"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="6"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="On" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="DimValue"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="1"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="100"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="LightSensorStatusType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="DARK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LIGHT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="LightType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="LT_NOT_SET"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RELAY"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ONE_TO_TEN_VOLT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ONE_TO_TEN_VOLT_REVERSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ONE_TO_TWENTY_FOUR_VOLT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DALI"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="LinkType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="LINK_NOT_SET"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GPRS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CDMA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ETHERNET"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EventNotificationType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="DIAG_EVENTS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="HARDWARE_FAILURE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LIGHT_EVENTS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TARIFF_EVENTS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MONITOR_EVENTS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FIRMWARE_EVENTS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COMM_EVENTS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SECURITY_EVENTS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TransitionType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="NIGHT_DAY"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DAY_NIGHT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

targetNamespace="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/common/2014/10" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/common/2014/10"> <xsd:element name="OrganisationIdentification" type="tns:Identification"/> <xsd:element name="UserName" type="tns:Identification"/> <xsd:element name="ApplicationName" type="tns:Identification"/> <xsd:element name="MessagePriority" type="tns:MessagePriority"/> <xsd:simpleType name="Identification"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^ ]{0,40}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MessagePriority"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="Page"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TotalPages" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="PageSize" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="CurrentPage" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CorrelationUid"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:minLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="AsyncRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CorrelationUid" type="tns:CorrelationUid" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="DeviceId" type="tns:Identification" minOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AsyncResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CorrelationUid" type="tns:CorrelationUid" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="DeviceId" type="tns:Identification" minOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="OsgpResultType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="OK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT FOUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT OK"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="FunctionalFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Code" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Message" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Component" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="InnerException" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="InnerMessage" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TechnicalFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Message" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Component" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="InnerException" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="InnerMessage" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>
